alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 1:24PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Jackson and southwestern Decatur Counties through 200 PM EDT/100 PM CDT/... At 124 PM EDT/1224 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Marianna, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Blue Spring, Union City, Lovedale, Sink Creek, Dellwood, Star, Two Egg, Simsville, Cypress, Alliance and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
